name: part_011
file: tmp_【＃癒月ちょこ誕生日LIVE】重大告知あり？！3Dお誕生日ライブ！【ホロライブ⧸癒月ちょこ】 [uHtWZbAu7iE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_011.mov

scenes.description: MC section where Yuzuki Choco announces her new song and says goodbye.

subtitles.original: とあの子のほうが君に似合いだなんて
subtitles.english: That she's a better match for you...

subtitles.original: 猿芝居と揺れる白衣
subtitles.english: The charade and the swaying lab coat.

subtitles.original: ふとした言葉も傷つけてしまう
subtitles.english: Even casual words end up hurting.

subtitles.original: 失うものなど何もない
subtitles.english: There is nothing left to lose.

subtitles.original: 無邪気な目で苦しめないで
subtitles.english: Don't torture me with those innocent eyes.

subtitles.original: 君のテストに大人さえも答えられない
subtitles.english: Even an adult can't answer your tests.

subtitles.original: 言葉に詰まる　好きだよと
subtitles.english: I'm at a loss for words, saying "I love you"...

subtitles.original: 全部捨てて抱き寄せてしまいたいのに
subtitles.english: Though I want to throw it all away and hold you close.

subtitles.original: そんな強い心じゃいられない
subtitles.english: I can't maintain such a strong heart.

subtitles.original: 私の答えに罰をつけて
subtitles.english: Give my answer a failing mark.

subtitles.original: これでいい　君のために
subtitles.english: This is fine, it's for your sake.

subtitles.original: そう決めたのに
subtitles.english: Even though I decided so.

subtitles.original: 猿芝居なびく白衣
subtitles.english: The charade, the fluttering lab coat.

subtitles.original: 思わず君を引き止める
subtitles.english: I reflexively stop you.

subtitles.original: 好きですか　の難題に
subtitles.english: To the difficult question, "Do you love me?"

subtitles.original: 許されない答えを書いた
subtitles.english: I wrote an unforgivable answer.

subtitles.original: 君の明日を縛るだけの独りよがりな
subtitles.english: A self-centered promise of love

subtitles.original: 恋の約束
subtitles.english: that only binds your tomorrow.

subtitles.original: ただ君の悲しむ顔
subtitles.english: If I just don't have to see...

subtitles.original: もう見送らなくていいなら
subtitles.english: ...your sad face anymore.

subtitles.original: たとえ悪魔と呼ばれてもいい
subtitles.english: I don't care if I'm called a demon.

subtitles.original: 甘く蕩けるようなひと時をあなたに
subtitles.english: I'll give you a moment that melts sweetly.

subtitles.original: ということで、重大告知その2は！
subtitles.english: And so, important announcement number two is!

subtitles.original: 今歌ったちょこの新曲！
subtitles.english: The new song I just sang!

subtitles.original: 奏音69先生書き下ろし、Secret Classでしたー！
subtitles.english: It was "Secret Class" written by Kanon69!

subtitles.original: いやちょこ、奏音69様のね、曲めちゃくちゃ好きで、
subtitles.english: I really love Kanon69-sama's music,

subtitles.original: まさかの作詞作曲書き下ろしされると思ってなくて、本当にちょこめちゃめちゃ感激しちゃった！
subtitles.english: and I never thought he'd write one for me, so I'm truly touched!

subtitles.original: そしてなんとこの後、21時からMV公開、
subtitles.english: And, believe it or not, the MV will be out at 21:00,

subtitles.original: そして楽曲配信が始まるので、ぜひぜひ皆さん概要欄のURLからね、
subtitles.english: and the digital release will start, so please check the link in the description,

subtitles.original: いっぱい聞いてみてください！
subtitles.english: and listen to it many times!

subtitles.original: それでは、最後までご視聴、誠にありがとうございました！
subtitles.english: Well then, thank you so much for watching until the very end!

subtitles.original: みんな大好き、おつかれとー！
subtitles.english: I love you all! Otsukare-to!
